name: coaly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
containing or consisting of coal, or like coal in appearance: The space in front of the mine was covered with coaly mud. The building loomed up before them, a coaly sillhouette.
More examplesFewer examplesThe town now has a clean sandy beach instead of mud, pebbles, and coaly cliffs.The presence of coaly particles in the sandstones indicates a rapid and short-lived coalification event soon after deposition.Those were the days when London was scarcely inhabitable because of the coaly foulness of its air.She looked tired, with coaly smudges under her eyes.
